Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Coney Island in 1973...
Injured on 8/31/1975 with a Bruised Ankle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/10/1977, off Daron Hamlin (LP)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/31/1977, off Nicky Rix (LYN)...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Halifax on 6/30/1977...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Capital City on 4/25/1978...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1980, hitting .517 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Halifax on 9/8/1980...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Gashouse on 5/12/1981...
Injured on 7/21/1982 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Hit 3 homeruns against Ashburn, driving in 7 runs on 4/25/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1984, hitting .474 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Gashouse on 9/27/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1984, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1986, hitting .474 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Manchester on 5/11/1989...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1990...
Had 2000th career hit on 7/26/1991, off Eddie Everett (PIL)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1991...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/9/1993 to a 3-year deal worth $513,000 per year...
